document_data.name: Green cabal
document_data.mainbody: The '''green cabal''' was a cabal of [[green dragon]]s during the [[Time of Dragons]].While the green cabal is never explicitly stated to be made up of green dragons, throughout the story it is stated that wyrms control almost all territory; thus, it is assumed for the purposes of this article that the cabal, and other forces facing King Orchtrien, are dragons.
document_data.Territory: They possessed lands to the west of King [[Orchtrien]]'s domain, until they lost these.
document_data.Relationships: The green cabal was a foe of King Orchtrien.
document_data.History: In {{yearlink|-25090}}, the green cabal lost a significant battle to the forces of King Orchtrien, being forced to abandon their lands east of some river.
